descriptionHtml:
Name: Arya Zirael - The Witcher Girl Companion
Version: 1.0
Date: 2012/24/07

------------------- [This is what? ] -----------------------

Everybody knows Geralt from Rivia - the hero of the great fantasy saga by Mr.Sapkovski and two computer games by CD Project.
Witchers - the hunters who eliminate any evil creatures like vampires, werewolves, undeads and so on.
Do you want to have the witcher follower in Skyrim?
Go to Kynesgroove to \"The Braidwood\" Inn and meet Arya Zirael.
She is a Witcher. 
Combat Style: combines One-handed Blades, Dual Blades, Destruction and Archery
Calculated Lvl from 15 to 70.
She is essential and also can be married.
Initial Outfit: Thieves Guild Armor
Initial Weapon: Steel and Silver Swords



Location
Braidwood Inn, Kynesgroove
If you dismiss her and then wish her to follow her she will be waiting for you at the place you have left her before



------------------- [Install] -----------------------
Please copy and overwrite in the \\ Skyrim DATA folder 
NMM is recommended.
Put the checkmark at the SNArya.esp in your launcher or NMM 

Just delete the esp.file to uninstall the mod

------------------- [Requirements] -----------------------
IMPORTANT! YOU MUST HAVE APACHI SKYHAIR V1.3 AT LEAST! The mod won`t work witout this!

Other mods you need for proper appearance

Better Females by Bella http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
The Eyes Of Beauty http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13722
RANs Eyebrow Replacer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5812
RANs Eyeliner Replacer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5701
UNP Female Body http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709
VAnilla Skin Texture v1-8 http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554

All cheers and credits to the modders whose mods are mentioned above!
Thanks Bethesda for the great game

Tools used
Bethesda Creation Kit


Bugs

Not detected so far



------------------- [Licensing / Legal] -------------
Feel free to modify, reuse or reupload just give me credit.



Enjoy!
Sandraniks
author: Sandraniks
